sentences.sContent: Stockman became one of the President’s most trenchant critics.
sentences.sCn: 斯托克曼成了总统最尖锐的批评者之一。

synos.tran: 尖刻的；锐利的；苛刻的；锋利的（名词trenchancy，副词trenchantly）

remMethod.val: trench(沟) + ant → 说话像挖沟， 入木三分 → 犀利的

trans.tranOther: expressed very strongly, effectively, and directly without worrying about offending people
